scripts.cdklocal:bootstrap: AWS_REGION=%[ cookiecutter.default_region ]% AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=%[ cookiecutter.default_region ]% AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4566 AWS_ENDPOINT_URL_S3=http://127.0.0.1:4566 AWS_S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE=true AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 cdk bootstrap aws://000000000000/%[ cookiecutter.default_region ]% --cloudformation-execution-policies arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AdministratorAccess
scripts.cdklocal:deploy: AWS_REGION=%[ cookiecutter.default_region ]% AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=%[ cookiecutter.default_region ]% AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4566 AWS_ENDPOINT_URL_S3=http://127.0.0.1:4566 AWS_S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE=true AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 cdk deploy --require-approval never
